Name: maximize_completed_story_points
Description: Sum of story points for all completed user stories in a sprint/project

Name: minimize_project_budget_overrun
Description: Minimize the difference between actual cost and planned budget

Name: maximize_feature_business_value
Description: Maximize the sum of priority scores for all implemented features

Name: maximize_team_velocity
Description: Maximize the average story points a team completes per sprint

Name: minimize_open_blockers_severity
Description: Minimize the sum of severity levels for all unresolved blockers

Name: maximize_team_satisfaction
Description: Maximize the team's satisfaction score from retrospectives

Name: minimize_total_task_effort
Description: Minimize the total estimated effort for all tasks in a sprint

Name: maximize_high_priority_epics
Description: Maximize the number of completed epics with the highest priority

Name: minimize_sprint_goal_failures
Description: Minimize the number of sprints where the sprint goal was not achieved

Name: maximize_stakeholder_interest_coverage
Description: Maximize the delivery of features relevant to stakeholders with high influence

Name: minimize_time_to_resolve_blockers
Description: Minimize the time between detecting and resolving a blocker

Name: maximize_worker_availability
Description: Maximize the utilization of workers according to their availability
